revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #42 Kebia |image = [[File:Kebia.png]] |caption = This Berry is a brilliant green on the outside. Inside, it is packed with a dry-flavored, black-colored flesh. It has a tendency to overtake nearby plants. Due to its poisonous nature, it increases the chances of mutations near it. |growtime = 10m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 100% |points = 50 |flavor =
*0 spicy *15 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Kebia''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by planting [[Pamtre]] and equipping the [[Poison Barb]]. The Pamtre will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 1 min 40 secs || 3 mins 20 secs || 6 mins 40 secs || 10 mins - 24 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KebiaTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KebiaTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:KebiaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (mutation chance) | ||
x1.2 ||
x1.4 ||
x1.6 |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 10 mins -
23 hours 50 mins || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 6 mins 40 secs -
15 hours 53 mins 20 secs || 2 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 4 mins 27 secs -
10 hours 35 mins 33 secs || 1 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Kebia berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Pamtre.png|30px]]
